name: acrobatically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves performing skilful, difficult body movements that are attractive to watch: She jumped acrobatically from boulder to boulder. The goalkeeper leapt through the air to acrobatically push the shot over the bar.
More examplesFewer examplesI sat and watched the nimble little birds dart acrobatically between the branches of the trees.The howler monkeys swung acrobatically from tree to tree, using their tails, howling as they went.The big central defender managed to acrobatically clear the ball off the goal line.
